feed.title: Category: Mike Tyson's Punch-Out!! | MECHAkunEX Media Diary

entry.title: Game: Mike Tyson's Punch-Out!! (NES, 1987) (11)
entry.content: I got Honda in the second round on the first down, but Soda Popinski napped me. I need to study his patterns.

entry.title: Game: Mike Tyson's Punch-Out!! (NES, 1987) (10)
entry.content: I KO'd Honda in the first round! Boom! But Soda Popinski got me within 1:30. :(

entry.title: Game: Mike Tyson's Punch-Out!! (NES, 1987) (9)
entry.content: TKO after 1:37 in the 2nd round. I did very poorly today.

entry.title: Game: Mike Tyson's Punch-Out!! (NES, 1987) (8)
entry.content: Made it through the first round of Honda without getting downed. We both went down twice in the second round. I got down twice in Round 3 and died at 2:12. I need to work on dodging the uppercut that comes after his four punches in sequence.

entry.title: Game: Mike Tyson's Punch-Out!! (NES, 1987) (7)
entry.content: Honda got me after 2 rounds and 19 seconds. I got him down once and jabbed him before his special attack to get a star, but he didn't get down that time. Weird.
